title: Golf's Horror Stories
headline: Golf's Horror Stories
description: For every golfer who has ever made an ace, played Pebble Beach or won the Masters, there's another sporting the scars from nightmarish scenarios like these. In honor of Halloween, here are golf’s 13 worst horror stories.
body: For every golfer who has ever made an ace, played Pebble Beach or won the Masters, there's another sporting the scars from nightmarish scenarios like these. In honor of Halloween, here are golf’s 13 worst horror stories.
